meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of protonemata
meanings.sent1: The protonematal growth was evident in the early stages of the plant's development.
meanings.sent2: The researcher studied the protonematal structures under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The protonematal patterns in the moss looked like tiny green labyrinths.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic creation was a protonematal masterpiece of intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The protonematal features of the moss were delicate and beautiful.
